name: Bearly Alive (sicfran774)
description:
Hey, we're Radical Cadavical! Thank you for checking out our first game! We are a group of students from Cal Poly Pomona; this was a group project for a game development course.

The Team

Mason Nash (Linkedin): Technique and Upgrade Design

Maya Tene: Art, Boss Design

Jesus Ruelas-Perez: Technique and Upgrade Design

Isaiah Hessler (Linkedin): Design Lead, Enemy Design, A* Pathfinding, Room Design

Ceiara Madrigal (GitHub): Music, Game Loop

Francis Rodriguez (GitHub): Room Logic/Generation, UI Map, Room Design
